text:
Drugmaker Moderna plans to study Canadian children during an upcoming clinical trial on its COVID-19 vaccine. The study will involve more than 6,700 healthy children both here and in the U.S. @LisaHepfnerCHCH reports. #vaccine #COVID19 #Canada

WATCH: https://t.co/faM1fOBIsp https://t.co/g5Jk27bXym
